Pre-Game Insights: The Cincinnati Reds will look to sweep a three-game series with a victory against the Pittsburgh Pirates.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates are up 7-5 in the season series.
Sunday's game is the 13th time these teams square off this season.
Others: The Reds have a 53-13 record in games when they out-hit their opponents.
The Pirates are 39-18 in games when they did not give up a home run.
